text: A: How about phelgam? Or incredible sonamarg? Or wonderful, parimahal We have vacations in every part of kashmir, so you can go wherever your heart leads you – or wherever your bank account can afford, whichever comes first.
A: If you're looking for a special summer getaway, we have a great vacation for you. If you're looking for a cheeky winter break, we can make it happen.
Q: What to pack for winters?

A:  If you're visiting in winters, you should pack some jackets and coats, pair of glove, some caps and a good waterproof shoes. And perhaps a battery pack for your iPhone so you can take lots of pictures to send back to your friends who are stuck at home.
Q: What to pack for summers?
A: What you need to pack depends on where you want to travel, but for summers you'll want to pack some sun cream, slippers as well as shoes as you may love to climb mountains.

This app was made by Aksa Nazir, who have made it their mission to build finely crafted works of art. This is no mere app: this is artisanal, craft Swift, delicately engineered to transport you to far off lands, forged in the fires of Mount Doom. Possibly.
